CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 18, 1961, pg. 7, reads: "Preparing Christmas Cheer - In order that under-privileged youngsters will not be forgotten by Santa Claus, these members of the Anna B. Heldman Society are preparing used and discarded toys, which will be sold to needy families at a very low price, during their annual Christmas Toy Bazaar, which will be held this year on Dec. 9, at the center. Lending a helping hand in top photo are, left to right: Mmes. Wendell Freeland, Louise Ford, Rose Scott, Libby Goins, Iris Roth and Vivian Colbert... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Anna B. Held Society, from left: Mrs. Wendell Freeland, Louise Ford, Rose Scott, Libby Goins, Iris Roth, and Vivian Colbert, standing over table with toys for Christmas bazaar
